Detailed Description

Contains logic used for manipulating program messages.

Function Documentation

void ipwd_message ( char *  msg,
int  type 
)

Handles output of messages generated by IPwatchD.

Parameters:
msg Message to output
type Type of message. Possible values are IPWD_MSG_INFO, IPWD_MSG_ERROR and IPWD_MSG_ALERT.

Variable Documentation

int debug_flag

Flag indicating debug mode.

int syslog_flag

Flag indicating that output of program must be recorded by syslog.
